patthana15.50:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
patthana15.50:1.1_0: dependently originated phenomena don’t give rise to the skillful. ...
patthana15.50:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
patthana15.50:2.1_0: Not grasping is unskillful, they don’t arise.
patthana15.50:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
patthana15.50:2.1_3: (This should be expanded as for the previous discourse.)
